item.title: My First Post
item.description: Just a short note “for now”… I figure once every few years I should make another post. When I went to migrate this blog off it’s previous VM to a new kubernetes managed VM I have recently provisioned, I found that I didn’t really want to deal with ruby just to update my blog and besides it appeared Jekyll hadn’t been touched in nine years! Think of all the features I’ve been missing out on!
